revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Airlink+ |model=AR315W |revision= |upc=658729080195 |ean= |asin=B0006GTGJE |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/22/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=ARM914 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MQ4ARM914 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8510 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Fujitsu |fla1_model=29LV800TE-90PFTN |ram1=4 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W981616BH-6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8510 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8010 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os=eCos |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:E0:98 |oui_eth=00:E0:98 }} :[http://www.airlinkplus.com/wireless/ar315w.htm Product page] :[http://www.airlinkplus.com/manuals/m-ar315w.pdf Manual] (obviously authored by [[SerComm]])
"M01-914M+-A10" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|AboCom}}
This board is highly homologous to the [[HotBrick SoHo 401W]], another device based on the [http://investor.marvell.com/phoenix.zhtml?c=120802&p=irol-newsArticle&ID=481084&highlight= Marvell AP-32 reference design]. :According to djb, [http://wikidevi.com/files/archive/djnetbsd_old/Marvell%20Libertas%20Wireless%20Routers.htm the board was designed by SerComm]. The [http://www.abocom.com.tw/product_download.aspx?name_id=D9FD1EA37934644AE6091A55FB5080FD firmware for the ARM914] corroborates this as the firmware contains strings indicating SerComm authorship.
The OUI used in this entry is per a marketplace (eBay) label, and, as expected, it is that of '''AboCom'''.
Mixed branding probable - this device was sold around the Airlink+ -> Airlink101 transition
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=366527 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (images) *[http://web.archive.org/web/20060515184630/http://mhos.free.fr/ar315w/ar315w.htm ''Info recovered'' via '''archive.org'''] *[http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r10883070-Airlink-AR315W-having-some-fun On '''DSLReports''']
The hardware appears to be the same as the [[Hawking HWR54G rev M]] and perhaps the [[Xterasys XR-2407G]]. Per the [http://www.airlink101.com/download/download_links/ar315w_manual.pdf manual] ([http://www.airlinkplus.com/manuals/m-ar315w.pdf alternative on Airlink+ site]), the default SSID is '''default'''.
==Additional notes== [http://www.ecoscentric.com/ecos/examples.shtml The '''eCosCentric''' product showcase notes this device as using '''eCos'''.]
